"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unser pers√∂nliches daten ohne unsere zustimmung sammeln und verkaufen? #dataprivacy #datenenschutz #respectmyprivacy"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data without our consent? #dataprivacy #dataprotection #respectmyprivacy"

explanation: in this post, i am expressing my frustration towards companies that collect and sell personal data without the consent of the individuals involved. i believe that it is important for individuals to have control over their own personal information and for companies to respect their privacy. the hashtags #dataprivacy, #datenenschutz, and #respectmyprivacy are used to reach a wider audience and to connect with others who share similar concerns about data privacy.
